name: Yurie Forest
description:
Yurei Forest is a platformer made in Lua and Love 2D for a university project.

[Controls]

  • A & D - Move player
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Click - Attack

[Goal]

Kill ghosts and collect coins to get a high score

Lua scripting by Alexander Jenkins

All sprite art found on itch.io

Music by Kevin MacLeod

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Kevin_MacLeod
